name: Giant Health
description:
GIANT = GLOBAL INNOVATION AND NEW TECHNOLOGY
 
What is GIANT Health?
An international community of people whose business is health, centred on an annual very large flagship event and supported by an ongoing stream of knowledge and connection sharing, to drive healthcare improvements and value from innovation.
 
Our Purpose
To improve the health and well-being of people around the world,
By promoting and facilitating innovation in healthcare technology,
And supporting health-tech entrepreneurs.

jobs.title: Giant Ambassador
jobs.description:
Formally commit to spending 1-2 hours per week from now to end November 2018.

Actively promote the GIANT health event to your personal and professional network.

Help facilitate introductions to potential sponsors, delegates, and exhibitors.

Attend bi-monthly conference calls with other Ambassadors. 

GIANT Ambassadors receive a monthly report on their contribution.

jobs.title: Sales Associate
jobs.description:
Gathering market and customer information.

Generating sales leads.

Phoning, emailing, visiting clients and potential clients to evaluate needs and promote products and services.

Giving sales presentations to a range of prospective clients.

Advising on forthcoming product developments and discussing special promotions.

Negotiating the terms of an agreement and closing sales.

Meeting or exceeding sales goals.

Preparing weekly and monthly reports.

Coordinating sales efforts with marketing programs.

Maintaining client records.

Representing GIANT Health at trade exhibitions, events and demonstrations.

jobs.title: “Entrepreneur in residence“ internship vacancy
jobs.description:
GIANT Health - a global community of health-tech innovators.

Job vacancy: “Entrepreneur in Residence” 1-year internship

Exciting opportunity for a passionate recent graduate
 Location: Flexible, with routine meetings in London, England 
 Start February 2020
£12,000 per year to £24,000 subject to experience and expertise


"Entrepreneur in residence“ internship vacancy

This is a powerful opportunity for a recent graduate to join a dynamic, ambitious, rapidly expanding business and work alongside highly successful international entrepreneurs.
a one year internship that includes basic pay, substantial commission opportunities and a meaningful equity reward.
The “entrepreneur in residence” intern will be directly working with BARRY SHRIER, the founder of GIANT Health, and other senior members of the GIANT health team.

A direct “how to become a successful entrepreneur“ training opportunity. 
The successful applicant will be given the highest levels of freedom and responsibility to create new products and innovate within the business to drive successful value, sales, and profits

In addition to the direct leadership opportunities and substantial exposure to how entrepreneurs successfully build business value, the successful applicant will have numerous direct face-to-face meetings with senior figures in politics, business, science, academia, and media. This is a unique, impactful opportunity for the successful applicant to grow rapidly a personal network that will create the strongest possible foundation for their career moving forward.

Time commitment:  full time for 1 year.
If you ask “how many hours per week”? “What time do you start in the morning / finish in the evening” please do not apply
The role can be partially fulfilled remotely; there is no need to be based in London, England.
However regular meetings (preferably in England) are necessary
Start: February 2020
Finish: December 2020

Key training and direct responsibilities and personal development / growth opportunities will include but not be limited to:
 
Taking an active role, with training, in all departments within the business on a rotating basis
Sales
Training and direct involvement in:
Sales lead generation, research, sales pipeline management.
Designing and selling new propositions
Telesales, face to face sales meetings.
Proposal writing.  Closing deals.
Managing customer relations.
Marketing
Creating content and owning the marketing plan and calendar to support various communication campaigns
Managing content on the GIANT health website and social media providing guidance for social media posts and weekly email newsletter activity
www.GIANT.health
 https://twitter.com/gianthealthevnt
https://www.linkedin.com/company/gianthealth/ Digital business development.
Engaging with and managing a global collection of social media influencers to promote the opportunity and grow sales
Market research, conducting polls, building “product to market fit” products and services.
Recruitment and management
Supporting the recruitment of additional members of the team, additional champions and ambassadors
Technology
Training in coding, website and digital platform creation and management
Finance
Direct training and responsibility within all the key financial elements of the business
Cashflow forecasting, budgeting, bookkeeping and financial control, building P&Ls, Balance Sheets...
Investor relations
Fundraising
Pricing strategies

This is a ‘roll up your sleeves and do stuff’ role, it is not an advisory/consultancy positions.  At GIANT the team ethos is not “you should do this, this, and this…”  Instead, like all successful ventures, the team ethos is “here is what the business needs, and I will tackle it and / or find someone who can assist and manage them and I will figure out how to fund this”
					
What we are looking for:
You are unusually passionate about success, hard-working, practical, and results-obsessed.
You are bright, articulate, resourceful and self-motivated with a proven history of success. 
You want to gain expertise in International networking.
Native English language skills.
You have a strong love of small ambitious businesses and the sacrifices / creativity / exceptional drive and self-innovation needed to be successful.	

							
HOW TO APPLY   -  Email your CV with a cover letter to Olga Nosova, Executive Assistant to Barry Shrier, Founder of GIANT Health.  Olga@GIANT.health
